definition: The word "vereinbart" refers to an action or agreement that has been previously discussed and established between two or more parties. It is commonly used to describe a prearranged arrangement, appointment, or understanding that has been mutually agreed upon.

examples.english: We have agreed on a date.

examples.german: Es wurde eine bestimmte Vorgehensweise vereinbart.
examples.english: A specific approach was agreed upon.
The contract terms were agreed upon.

examples.german: Wir haben vereinbart, uns um 10 Uhr zu treffen.
examples.english: We have agreed to meet at 10 o'clock.
